name: Undead
description: Being a member of the undead, you inherit most of the properties commonly found in other undead like zombies and skeletons.

badges.text: §eYou are immune to the §npoison§e status effect.
§eYou are immune to the §nregeneration§e status effect.
§eYou take damage from the §ninstant health§e status effect.
§eYou heal damage from the §ninstant damage§e status effect.
§eYou take an extra damage 2.5 damage for every level of §nsmite§e the attacker uses.
